Douglas Archibald Campbell ISO (13 Disemba 1906 7 Machị 1969) bụ onye nkuzi New Zealand na onye na-echekwa ala
A mụrụ ya na Dunedin, New Zealand, na 13 Disemba 1906.
Campbell gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Canterbury Ọrụ ugbo (nke bụzi Mahadum Lincoln) na nzere masta na red clover n'afọ 1930.
N'afọ 1967, ụlọ akwụkwọ Canterbury Agricultural nyere Campbell Bledisloe Medal. N'afọ 1968 New Year Honours, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ibe nke Imperial Service Order.
